author: Staff Reporter
text:
Two days after the Delhi Police issued a lookout notice for five absconding students named in a sedition case for allegedly shouting anti-national slogans in JNU, the students returned to the campus on Sunday evening.

University sources said Umar Khalid, Rama Naga, Ashutosh Kumar, Anant Prakash and Anirban Bhattacharya came back with the intention to surrender.

A police team was sent to the campus.
title: Absconding students return
